website_summaries.verdict: The Turtle Beach Ear Force Stealth 450 is an inexpensive wireless gaming headset that makes some compromises in comfort.
cons: Uncomfortably tight design with minimal padding
Lacks high-frequency sculpting needed for balance Surround sound isn't effective in a headset

customer_reviews.title: All in all worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones, good signal quality, sturdy, mind you, I haven’t dropped them  yet... Not very comfortable to wear, especially over long sessions. Sound quality is good, could be better. I use them for cs go, they suffice. The side bits may rattle sometimes, which is a bit annoying. Good mic and a nice feature is that you can hear yourself. It can be unplugged. Since I’m a right handed I would’ve liked the controls to be on the left side. You can use them with a regular jack, you can play while charging. The charge holds enough. 10 hours I think. Another nice feature is that they power off themselves if not used. Save draining battery.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey Nuts

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headset, its comfortable and has really good sound quality, the only issue I have is that the woman's voice scares the life out of me when she randomly shouts out something about auto shutdown enabled, or when she screams battery low down your ear. Other than that I love them! Also a bonus, these will work with Nintendo Switch, I got them for my Xbox One S originally.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Keep breaking
customer_reviews.text: For the most part this is a pretty good headset. The phones aren't exactly HiFi but they're clear, which is what you want for gaming; and the microphone seems to work well. In fact, I'd have no trouble at all recommending them, were it not for one fault. The right hand side arm breaks after a few months use. I've now bought two headsets and both of them broke in exactly the same place. Before you tell me it might be the way I use them, I've never had this problem with other headsets or headphones I've had. I'm going to look for another headset now, and it won't be these.
customer_reviews.author: Vlodec

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, tiny headphones for people with small, small ears!
customer_reviews.text: My last headset was turtlebeach - it had great sound and was very comfortable so I deliberately sought out Turtlebeach when I dropped my old ones one time too many! Unfortunately these seem to be modelled on a child's head. I had to expand them to near max to put them on & then they are digging into the side of my head! Very uncomfortable. Unfortunately the ear cups also seem quite small and actually curl the edges of my ear to fit them in. If you have a small head - go for it, if you are a normal sized adult male, I'd look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Komerade Snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought these almost 2 years ago and they are still going strong. I can still get a full day of gaming out of the battery and it only takes a few hours to charge. Some slight cons i found. The creaking of the plastic if your eating while wearing them or moving to much does get a little tiresome. Also the horrendous voice they chose to tell you when the battery is getting low. it will grind on your nerves after a while.. All in all though im very happy with these headphones and i still use them after 2 years of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: HoboCrust

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headset
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a standard pair of headphones and omg the 7.1 surround sound is amazing compared to standard stereo. Gives you a definite advantage and adds to the emersion of your game. The mic is good too. Never had an issue with wind noise or being too loud or quiet. Comfort isnt an issue either. I don't generally game for extremely long periods. The longest I've worn it in one sitting was 3 hours and at no point did I feel like it was uncomfortable on my head or ears.
customer_reviews.author: jord90

customer_reviews.title: Side arm snapped.
customer_reviews.text: They were an amazing headset, until yesterday. I bought these in dec 2016 for £90 and they have just snapped on the right hand side, pretty poor for a unit of this ‘quality and price’ won’t buy Turtle Beach’s again. Although, sound quality was amazing Before they broke.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and clear
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful headphones. I'm sat quite far from my PC, and they'll still connect with no issues at all. Found myself half way downstairs once, with them still on my head. They're so light, you can almost forget they're there! They have a detactable mic, so if you're not doing any voice chat or recording, you can easily just clip if off with ease. I've also done some recordings to see whether or not they're producing a decent mic quality, and it's superb. When I have played online, I've never had any issues, people can hear me loud and (most importantly) clear :)
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great PC gaming headphones
customer_reviews.text: I will admit that they are a little tight at first but that soon goes, I've worn them for 4 hours straight without any issues. Sound quality is good once you download the surround sound driver which like others have said needs to be downloaded from the USA site as the link for the UK one doesn't do anything. I've got a set of Turtle Beach PX4 which do sound as good but I constantly get sound dropouts and interference, with the 450 I'm yet to get any issues like that. I'd highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite sound quality, well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved using turtle beach headphones for Xbox, Ps4 and PC. The thing that puts me off of most headphones are the long cables so having a wireless headset is a most have for me. The range allows me to sit across the room and listen to music or game with a controller. The range for me is about 8 metres once I leave my room which is more than enough, (It's just what I've noticed when leaving the room with them still on.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Taylor - Kitching

customer_reviews.title: Good headset, but broke after less than 1.5 years of moderate use
customer_reviews.text: I liked this headset and was really happy with my purchase, that is until the right ear-cup snapped off the rest of the body after only 16/17 months of moderate use. The headset was treated with great care, it wasn't dropped once or overstretched, the plastic simply broke. Very disappointing, I feel as though a £100 headset should last at least 2/3 years before it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great before they broke, followed by poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: These are great sound quality, comfortable headphones. I was using mine successfully for months with VR. Then the plastic extending part snapped, just out of warranty. Turtle beech said they could not send the replacement part, even if I paid. So now I have to throw them away, as you can't even glue back together as its a high stress point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter who's a big WOW gamer so she never likes to miss out on what's going on in the game, she's had 2 other wired ones which broke, she's had these nearly a year now and they are still working great!! She can even come away from her computer downstairs to eat and not miss what's going on in the game. Looked after properly these headphone will last a long time and they are a good but so don't go spending much more on ones that work the same A++
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I spend most of my day on the computer playing games, studying, and/or listening to music. They're comfortable to wear and the battery lasts a long time. Even then, you can still use them while they're charging. The sound quality is great and you can adjust the wireless input volume separately to the jack volume so I can listen to two devices at the same time. After a year, one of the extending arms partially broke and since then I've been using them fine but I had to push that arm all the way in. Today the other one broke. Still works I just cant wear them properly with both arms pushed in as they aren't large enough. Definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: terrible build design
customer_reviews.text: the plastic is so cheap it creaks and transmits it over the microphone when you move your jaw, they split after 8 months use, i dont have a big head either. not buying TB again sound was decent but what good is that when half the ear phones are dangling down avoid
customer_reviews.author: dave00dance

customer_reviews.title: Good quality audio
customer_reviews.text: Good quality audio. Great quality Mic for the price. Material on the ear pads isn't the best, but they are VERY light and easy to wear for long periods. Wireless distance is pretty impressive & can often be taken in the next room or downstairs. Only thick brick walls can stop it. Compared to my Audio Techica M40X, I would say they are about 85% there. Which isnt bad at all for the price. Mic is about 70% of a condenser Mic like the Yeti Blue. Surprisingly good for what it is, but not amazing. Overall 8.9/10
customer_reviews.author: Scott MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Good headset, breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 of these, each of them probably got used for about a year. The sound and mic quality is good and it's comfortable enough for long sessions. A big negative of this headset is how flimsy the plastic is. I am not rough with handling my headsets, yet both of the pairs I own have snapped in the same location. The right headphone is left hanging by the wire on both pairs. It's a good purchase if you're looking for a cheap headset but it'll likely give out on you after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Darren S.

customer_reviews.title: Steathly Headset
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headset you don't notice the hiss when silent. Sound quality is good not mindblowing but impressive for mid priced headset such as this. The auto shutdown talking woman grates after a while having to keep push the button if its silent for too long Comfortable to wear after stretching out. Easy to setup and use Shame it cant work wirelessly for all other consoles and its geared to PC it would have gotten 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J

customer_reviews.title: Good for long conference calls
customer_reviews.text: I was after a wireless headset for long calls. At first it was clamping my head really tightly and I was ready to send it back. It loosened up by the end of the first week and is comfortable now. The sound quality is great and I can make out non English accents more easily.
customer_reviews.author: A Dog called Frodo

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Turtle Beach has a bit of a love hate relationship in the gaming world. But I can tell you that for £100 this is top quality and I have had it for about 18 months - No problems at all and the sound quality is phenomonal :)
customer_reviews.author: Detrucci

customer_reviews.title: Mike is awesome! Well compared against my old ones anyways
customer_reviews.text: Mike is awesome! Well compared against my old ones anyways. First time gone wireless and already had its benefits(going downstairs to get a drink lol). Hope the battery will last. Once connected it seemed to work fine no problems so far. Sound quality does not seem to deteriorate when further away from the connector. Sound quality is about the same as the other 70 quid surround headset I had until it broke due to the damn wire(so going wireless does not make the sound worse-far from it :)))).
customer_reviews.author: Vladislav

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Beach Stealth 450.
customer_reviews.text: This headset is great and a must for any PC gamer, exactly what I wanted/needed. Sound quality, mic quality and charge life are amazing for the price and the added voice prompts are a nice feature for a wireless headset. Black and red so a + for that since my rig is based upon those colours. Had for over 7+ months and is still working great so reliability is on point, 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bronstantine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pc and gaming headphones
customer_reviews.text: Better then I expected, excellent bass booster, excellent sound range and warm tone. Really happy with the easy to set up dongle and driver from.the website for 7.1 surround. Feel sturdy and the mic is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headset with a few minor imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: This headset is amazing for hearing footsteps and such in games like call of duty and player unknowns battleground. However I don’t find the superhuman hearing or 7.1 surround sound to be of any use, of anything it’s a bit of a hinderence, luckily north of these options can be disabled. The build quality is excellent for the price and the audio quality is crisp with lots of base. Great entry level wireless headset 9/10.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Where to start this is the quitest headset I have used in my life the sound quality is so bad too don't be fooled by the good reviews these people obviously never used high quality headsets before sounds like someone is suppressing the sound with a tin can
customer_reviews.author: Dylan robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good wireless headphones they work very well were easy to set up and surround sound is a help when gaming
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Great in every aspect, except for comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound and microphone quality, easy to use with buttons on the right ear cup. However for me personally they are very difficult to get to a comfortable position, over not too long of a timespan (about an hour) my ears/head will start to hurt and it takes a lot of adjusting to get them to anything more than bearable. Battery life is good and wireless range is excellent, they reach to my bathroom so the people I'm on Discord with can hear me pee which is a plus in my books. Just a shame they aren't too comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my other half, who loves them and uses them all the time. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W

customer_reviews.title: stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: Been using these since January 5th ... but now they wont charge , cant contact anyone , brand new and now dead and useless
customer_reviews.author: M1ssnuttie1

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and solidly built
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and solidly built. Comes well packaged with decent documentation. The sound quality is excellent both speaking and hearing. I have had one or two driver issues which have yet to be resolved, causing no sound to be audible until a restart is performed, but this probably happens one in every 10 gaming sessions so it's no big deal really.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: you can walk around freely and still listen to music!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headphones, my other half LOVES THEM you can wander around the house and still listen to youtube or whatever. mic is crystal clear
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V. A. Oag

customer_reviews.title: Great head set but buy a longer usb cable
customer_reviews.text: Would of been 5 star if the wireless charging wire had been longer , very short just about managed to charge it sat on top of the tower from the USB port , had to buy a longer cable so I could continue gaming and charging
customer_reviews.author: Melanie mum

customer_reviews.title: Rattling power button.
customer_reviews.text: The sound awesome the battery life perfect but the only thing was you can hear the power on button rattling away every time you move for that 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is not great. Strangely on some games the sound is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is not great. Strangely on some games the sound is terrible. The build quality is awful and will clearly break within a few months of buying
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones and my son reckons these are the best he has had. Great sound, really clear he tells me. Similar to other reviews, instructions not helpful in terms of downloading drivers but as previous reviewer has said, go to Turtle Beach and change flag from UK to USA and everything works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY Prone to Breaking
customer_reviews.text: Gone through three of these now and they keep snapping at the ear piece like other pictures show. If they could put everything about this headset onto a metal frame instead of cheap plastic this headset would be unbeatable by even the most expensive headset money can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: For the price versus other brands which are between £60 to £100 more, these are unbeatable. Good battery life, excellent sound quality, good comfort and very good mic. The monitor mode on the mic is also very useful. I would add a pop filter to the mic though, as when recording you can hear some breathing noise due to it's position.
customer_reviews.author: BuckRogers25

customer_reviews.title: Good headset, bad Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful headset but extremely unresponsive customer support (Turtle Beach). Apparently my headset was faulty, contacted them and first two e-mails were brilliant. Things complicated when I've just received RMA label. No explanation or anything. I've contacted Turtle Beach if it's pre-paid or not and if not, do they want tracked delivery etc. For over a week, I recieved no reply :<
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Good headset but could be better. Edit: 1 year later and I don't know what i was thinking. Sure it's not the best on the market but it is fantastic for people who love to "sound whore" on video games or listen to music. Doesn't hurt my ears what so ever even after long hours. Dimensions of the inner ear cup is 6cm in height and 4cm in width. 100% recommend these fantastic earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Li

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the high quality of the sound and bass, long life battery and fast charging. The single bad thing I found is that the holders of the speakers are made with low quality and fragile plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Marius-Victor Scarlat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time very pleased with item and a fair price will recomend
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic snapped - not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: Plastic snapped as pictured in all the other reviews. Exact same spot. Not worth the price i paid.
customer_reviews.author: pandabells

customer_reviews.title: really good for game
customer_reviews.text: really good for game, and is ok for listen to music, but headphone are very tight usually headache if wore long time. price is very good Compare other shop。
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day and it works well, I love the wireless capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Jamiek540

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a month or so, have to say best gaming headset I've owned, do a sterling job for when I'm gaming or listening to music
customer_reviews.author: francis smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Of course there is better out there, but at this price I can't fault these. Very comfy and love the mic monitoring dial, something which I have always appreciated on TB headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but weak and fragile pastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in june of 2019. Last week the headset broke at the extendor. I would like to request a replacement if possible
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: He is very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to go with my sons gaming computer. He is very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: They sound great in games but they were difficult to get to ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound great in games but they were difficult to get to work. You need drivers which didn't come with the product. The link to it was buried in a forum thread rather than on the support page. They are tight on the head and around the temples which caused me to get a headache BUT I might just have a thick head ;)
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Goa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected, great fit and very comfortable, great sound quality and great battery, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Broken/defective
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks of use the headband snapped. I have attempted to repair it but it won’t stay together and can not refund the product anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Aabbaa

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son for on line gaming so far no complaints so must be ok
customer_reviews.author: tibbysuki

customer_reviews.title: Works with Nintendo switch!
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play wireless headphones fully compatible with Nintendo switch TV mode 👍
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. J. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great, until the arms both broke..
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound quality wireless headset, until the arms both broke.. had they of used a metal layer to reinforce the arms, they would be incredible, however, they didn't. What a shame..
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Melluzzi

customer_reviews.title: not the most comfortable (with glasses)
customer_reviews.text: Sound is alright, not the most comfortable (with glasses). Ear cuffs not soft enough personall.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great product not very robust
customer_reviews.text: Great product to start with, but had them just over a year and they will no longer charger, disappointing considering the cost
customer_reviews.author: E E ABERY

customer_reviews.title: The headset is great, Amazing sound etc
customer_reviews.text: The headset is great, Amazing sound etc, However 3 months down the line it decides it doesn't want to charge anymore, Just outside of the eligible return period, Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: So a great Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son they are the only one's he will use. So a great Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: Really great headset for a wireless 7.1 surround sound headset. Slightly uncomfortable at first but it soon molds to your head shape. Worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Tovey

customer_reviews.title: Need help
customer_reviews.text: Great headset but I was wondering why could I buy a mic because I lost mine ? Just the actual mic not headphones
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Swan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy Turtlebeach.
customer_reviews.text: Given a 2 for the sound quality, but do not buy these headsets. Turtlebeach are made to break.
customer_reviews.author: liam

customer_reviews.title: Solid build and the sound is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid build and the sound is great for the price.They are very light too. The range is what i was looking for when i go in the garden,great to have music or radio then,
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schafer

customer_reviews.title: just got these and bad points * they are really really tight to get ...
customer_reviews.text: just got these and bad points * they are really really tight to get on - may loosen up * the USB adapter is huge - this is a big let down * they don't fit well if you were glasses good points * sound is really good compared to my beats solo hd wired * wireless * mic is detachable
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Have not found any faults with this headset. Well made and supplies good sound and mic.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Was a great product until it snapped above the right earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: James Wraight

customer_reviews.title: not reliable
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately the volume control broke after 1 year of use. not good enough considering the price!
customer_reviews.author: Hannibal Smiff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones as I read many good reviews about them. Son not disappointed at all
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headphones. Good battery life and sound quality. Good for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken but normally are good
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken will be sending them back for a refund although they normally are a good headset
customer_reviews.author: Twitch.tv/Adamow02

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers, If you're looking for something you'll get ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Speakers, If you're looking for something you'll get the most bang for your buck with these, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Hopewell

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: i am very impressed with the advantages you gain from having wireless headphones that are ALSO rechargeable, great product for the price,,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent headset for pretty much everything at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flawed, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: USB transmitter needs clear line of sight to the headphones so must be front mounted on the PC and breaks very easily if caught on a trouser leg which it is liable to do if the PC is on the floor. Auto power off feature is an annoyance as it tries to switch itself off whether or not it has an active signal. Audio is decent quality though and great ambient noise cancellation. USB recharge fails after about a year. Low quality materials and poorly constructed, better to save money and buy Chinese than buy these
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great but not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound and user friendliness. However, they get a bit uncomfortable after an hour or so of use. edit. After a few more months usage I can confirm these are so uncomfortable that nobody should buy them. Great for 30 mins or so at a time but like a cheese grater on your ear after
customer_reviews.author: cougarric

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good, mic quality is good
customer_reviews.text: Very tight clamping on the head, leaves an impression around your ears in your hair, it's that tight.. Sound quality is good, mic quality is good. I wish I could return these as I won't use them again, they feel uncomfortable and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Took forever to get it working. Then product will ...
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to get it working. Then product will only work while powered by USB - despite it constantly saying that it is fully charged. Going straight back as faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Holliday

customer_reviews.title: nope.
customer_reviews.text: headband broke after a year and i kept getting problems like, turning off without warning and not turning on unless you plug it in usb or just various interferences
customer_reviews.author: Murk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bit of kit, everything sounds amazing and the microphone easily picks up your voice very clearly.
customer_reviews.author: NedHC

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these headphones expecting a long term replacement after ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones expecting a long term replacement after having to yearly purchase headphones that have a cable brake and not even a year later the plastic has snapped on both ends and i find myself needing new headphones yet again, if you think these will laste you a year don't bother, i tried to hold it together with epoxy but that doesn't help, the cheap plastic wont last which is a shame because the audio and microphone quality is good
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Wont charge, wont work.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor, especially for the price. Very uncomfortable for the little time used, as they would not charge either from PC ( crashed PC ) or from the mains.
customer_reviews.author: NHB

customer_reviews.title: Broken right in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Very very very bad, I highly recommend avoiding this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Well this was disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Headset is stupidly tight on my head, feels like it cost a quid to manufacture, and if you turn the mic volume up it hisses. Was out of the box for 10 minutes before being sent back for a refund. AVOID
customer_reviews.author: bert

customer_reviews.title: feels like plastic tbh
customer_reviews.text: feels like plastic tbh, looks soo good on pictures but gona be honest dont buy these look for something else if you cant then come back to these but 90 pounds is too much; the volume is not that great but atleast theres no wires xD
customer_reviews.author: Beste Kay

customer_reviews.title: BUY THE RIGHT ONES!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, I messed up and got these instead of the Xbox 1 headset, but they still work great for PC, and work ok with the Xbox and PS4 as well. The only huge issue with using them on the gaming consoles is that they turn off every once in a while on their own and don't wireless sync to the consoles, but still work nonetheless. Just know that for them to be amazing you have to buy the ones made for the consoles...
customer_reviews.author: Mikaelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase, wish I would have researched into this headset a little more prior to buying because I would have liked this headset to work with gaming consoles as well as PC but it seems it only is compatible with the PC. Other than that this is a great headset for gaming, music, movies, etc. For 100$ you cannot beat the quality. For me getting an enclosed earmuff style headphone is important because on the ear headphones hurt my ears for long sessions, these fit my whole ear in each cup and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MC1990

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is good but I wish the volume could go up a ...
customer_reviews.text: When you first try these on they are quite stiff and a little uncomfortable but after only wearing for a few hours the padding gets softer. Also the mesh material that's used for the earcups keep your ears from getting hot. The headset comes with a charger and a 3.5mm aux cord for mobile use or anything else you'd use it on and a USB dongle for connecting to your PC or PS4.The sound quality is good but I wish the volume could go up a little more. I am using these wirelessly on the PS4 and the 7.1 surround sound is amazing. Also all the buttons on the headset work flawlessly on the PS4. I'll update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Shadrene

customer_reviews.title: One of the best sounding budget headsets but very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 2 pairs of these over the years because the sound quality is very good for the price you pay. But they are built very cheap and both sets broke on me in the exact same place. The slide adjustment that also holds the earpiece to the headset, broke. They were never dropped or abused but I guess the repetition of spreading them over your head everyday is simply too much for the plastic to withstand. The last time I paid for the Square Trade warranty thinking it was an accidental policy, it is not.....DOH! This last pair didn't even last a year, will never buy Turtle Beach again, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M.

customer_reviews.title: "AUTO SHUTDOWN ENABLED
customer_reviews.text: "AUTO SHUTDOWN ENABLED If I could turn that off the rating would be 5+ stars .. but with "AUTO SHUTDOWN ENABLED they are useable I will not be re powering on my head set every 10 min... if you talk none stop they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Klesinger

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Materials and a Ridiculous Price Tag
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great sound and microphone works well. Cons: This is my second set of this model in 3 years. Glad we got the warranty for them because the plastic used on the adjustment track is absolute garbage. In both cases, the headsets were well maintained and in fact still looked like new. Both of them failed in the exact same place. The ear adjustment band on the right side cracked right where it slides into the headband. This is a known issue now. Check the reviews and see how many people have had this failure. I have a prorated refund coming because I bought the Assurion Warranty. Glad I did. We’ll never buy Turtle Beach products again.
customer_reviews.author: MJL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a TB headset in the past and its headband broke. I waited a decade to get these because of that horrible experience and guess what... they still use cheap plastic. The best possible way I can describe this kind of plastic is comparing it to a plastic cup that's been left outside for a few years. It's like dry rotted plastic and it snaps so easily. The sound is good, the earphones do not cut out, I'm told that I'm heard loud and clear on the other end, but what the headband is made of is absolute crap. What's really sad is that these were pricey while the cheap bluetooth headsets, like MPow are not, but last FOREVER.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, nice compfort, poor durability
customer_reviews.text: I really liked Turtle Beach headsets. Their sound quality and confort is excellent. However I'm finding that the durability of pretty much all gaming headsets is severly lacking. I owned at least 2-3 pairs of this model, each time (lasts about a year) the plastic would breack at the ear cup / headband hinge point. Over time it develops stress fractures in the plastic, just from normal use and eventually will crack and break off. Unfortunately I'm seeing this across most manufacturers. Seems the only way to get long lasting durable headsets is to purchase very expensive studio headphones and get a USB adaptor for the PC.
customer_reviews.author: Bearcban

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This headset is made poorly. The sliders that extend to adjust the size for your head snapped on mine after only owning it for five months.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Froman

customer_reviews.title: Great device, minor discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Great quality device for the price. The sound quality is good (not spectacular, but great given that its wireless and digital) and the various equalizer options are nice, though I don't tend to change between them. The mic has a dial for letting it pass through to the headphones to give an open-back effect where you can hear your own voice, and thats a nice feature. Also holds a charge for quite a long time. Only negative I have to say is that it grips pretty tightly, and the cups aren't big enough to fit all the way around my ears, so wearing them for a while can cause some discomfort. YMMV on that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Blown Away
customer_reviews.text: These are without a doubt, the best gaming headphones I have ever used. The 7.1 emulation is incredible and the sound quality is superb. I love the built in audio queues when you power the unit off or on or when you mute the microphone. They are light and comfortable and the range on the wireless adapter is great. Having these makes a world of difference in gaming immersion and allows me to get the full sound experience for my games at night without waking up my neighbors. Best gaming headphones in this price range by a mile.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Headband cracked, TB Support Useless
customer_reviews.text: I've loved these headphones, and would have given a 5 star review, however after a strange crack formed (I did not drop or damage it) in the headband, I contacted Turtle Beach Support to see if I could get a replacement piece of plastic. There are screws and it looks like it could be swapped. However, they were anything but helpful, saying that I would just need to buy a new headset and throw the old one out. Toss it in the landfill because one small piece of plastic, an easily replaceable part breaks?!?! Umm, no thanks. I won't continue to support a company who's attitude is such a disposable one.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, but only lived three years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in April 2016 and have been largely satisfied with it, but would not buy it again. Pros: The quality, comfort, range, and battery life of this headset are all above-average. Nothing was amazing, but overall it was a good headset. The buttons are reasonably well-placed and it functions well overall. Cons: Auto-shutdown was very aggressive and annoying. The signal was easily disrupted by appliances and walls, incapable of functioning in my kitchen only 20 feet away from the receiver. After just under three years of use, the headphones will no longer charge unless the cable (any cable) is held at a particularly sharp angle.
customer_reviews.author: Yawgmoth

customer_reviews.title: broke within 9 months, they sent me a refurbished product as replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I always put off buying a legit gaming headset but this price was really good, especially for being wireless. And the $7 for a 3 year warranty was a nice touch. 9 month Update: The band broke on the headset. I contacted the Warranty I bought first for replacement options, they told me to contact Turtle Beach. Which I did, I sent photos and everything went fine. When I received the replacement, it was a refurbished product in a white box. I kind of feel duped since I had the manufacturers warranty and the warranty I bought. And they sent me a refurbished product instead of a proper replacement. I probably won't be buying from Turtle Beach again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Quality Headset... for awhile...
customer_reviews.text: This headset really delivers on sound quality, features, and mic quality. Yet all these great points are overshadowed by the fact that just a year in and it had already snapped along the headband, leaving only half of the adjustable length on that side usable. Now, a year and a half in the other side have also snapped, leaving the headset all but unusable. It's unfortunate that this headset delivered on everything except build quality. I have also experienced the battery life dwindling. I am lucky to get just a few hours of playtime without charging. Overall, if you are looking for a short-term product this headset will deliver, but don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great range and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought these headphones would be compressing my head a bit since they were stiff and I needed to expand them to max size, but they adjusted relatively fast and fit over my whole ear rather than resting on top like others might. Sound is top notch for the price, great lows and clear highs, mic works wonderfully, I usually have to use push to talk because mics have difficulty picking my voice up, but not with this headset! Also, the range is insane. I walked across my house (from corner of second floor to opposite room on the first) and still had perfect connection. Will update if I have any issues soon.
customer_reviews.author: DACOW

customer_reviews.title: My ears are a tad too large
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this headset, BUT I am a large dude. And like other large dudes I have large ears. It is supposed to be an over ear, not on the ear headset. Well, its kind of a hybrid for me cuz after an hour or two I can tell that my ear is just barely cramming into the headphones. All other functions are great. Battery life is phenomenal. I go on 12+ hour gaming binges occasionally and have not had it die on me one time. If you go longer than that I think you need be less concerned about battery life and more concerned about your own lol
customer_reviews.author: allelsetaken

product_meta.title: Turtle Beach Stealth 450 Wireless Gaming Headset - DTS Headphone:X 7.1 Surround Sound - PC
product_meta.description:
The EAR FORCE Stealth 450 is a premium, 100% fully wireless PC gaming headset packed with features, including booming 50mm speakers, DTS Headphone:X 7.1 Surround Sound and a wireless USB transmitter for crystal clear game and chat audio. The Stealth 450 comes with Superhuman Hearing, giving you the competitive advantage of hearing enemies before they come into view, plus DTS Surround Sound modes, four audio presets, Mic Monitoring and removable high-sensitivity boom mic. Voice prompts, a 15 hour rechargeable battery, and mobile/tablet compatibility round out this cutting-edge PC gaming headset. Complete Features: 100% Fully Wireless No wires anywhere. Experience crystal clear game and chat audio using the latest, intelligent channel-hopping technology for interference-free wireless gaming. DTS Headphone:X 7.1 Surround Sound and Surround Sound Modes Experience DTS Headphone:X 7.1 Surround Sound with incredibly accurate, unmatched spatialization, and DTS Surround Sound modes further immerse you in your favorite games, movies and music. Superhuman Hearing This exclusive Turtle Beach audio preset gives you the competitive advantage of hearing enemies before they come into view. Hear everything, defeat everyone! Full-Range Audio High-performance 50mm Neodymium speakers deliver sizzling highs and thunderous lows. STOP SHOUTING! Mic Monitoring lets you hear your own voice in the headset to avoid shouting. Mic Check A high-sensitivity, adjustable boom mic picks you up loud and clear. Remove the mic to enjoy mobile/tablet gaming, as well as listening to music and watching movies. Shhh...Listen Audible voice prompts from the headset tell you what setting you've selected. 15 Hour Rechargeable Battery A built-in rechargeable battery delivers up to 15 hours of wireless gameplay. 
Note: Item comes with removable mic boom that needs to be firmly seated for good connection.

BOX CONTAINS
EAR FORCE Stealth 450 Wireless Surround Sound PC Gaming HeadsetRemovable MicWireless USB TransmitterUSB Charging CableMobile/Tablet CableQuick Start Guide
feature_bullets: 100 percent wireless: Experience crystal clear, interference-free game and chat audio with 100 percent wireless connectivity to PC
DTS headphone: X 7.1 Surround Sound, pinpoint the exact location of every sound with immersive 7.1 Surround Sound

Superhuman hearing: Gain the competitive advantage by hearing every single sound around you, like enemies sneaking up on you, weapon reloads and vehicles off in the distance bringing in reinforcements
Mic monitoring: Say it…don't shout it, thanks to the ability to hear the volume of your own voice inside the headset
Simple setup: Simple setup with one USB connection to your PC

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
